abstract: Bank of America is in talks to acquire Countrywide Financial, the troubled mortgage lender in which it has a $2 billion stake, people briefed on the situation told DealBook.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America is in talks to acquire Countrywide Financial, the troubled mortgage lender in which it has a $2 billion stake, people briefed on the situation told DealBook.

headline.main: BofA, Countrywide Said to Be in Merger Talks
